text.98_Daf, 2_Line, 0_Comment: They would sleep in straw on account of poverty.
text.98_Daf, 2_Line, 1_Comment: He would gather straw from what was stuck in his hair.
text.98_Daf, 2_Line, 2_Comment: I would crown you [with a] Jerusalem of Gold: And so he did, as it it is found in Shabbat (59a).
text.98_Daf, 3_Line, 0_Comment: That he is not similar to you: He is not fitting and worthy of you.
